com.facebook.react.turbomodule.core.interfaces

接口 TurboModule

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AndroidInfoModule, DeviceInfoModule, ImageLoaderModule, NativeAccessibilityInfoSpec, NativeAccessibilityManagerSpec, NativeActionSheetManagerSpec, NativeAlertManagerSpec, NativeAnimatedModuleSpec, NativeAnimationsDebugModuleSpec, NativeAppearanceSpec, NativeAppStateSpec, NativeAsyncStorageSpec, NativeBlobModuleSpec, NativeBugReportingSpec, NativeCameraRollManagerSpec, NativeClipboardSpec, NativeDatePickerAndroidSpec, NativeDeviceEventManagerSpec, NativeDeviceInfoSpec, NativeDevLoadingViewSpec, NativeDevMenuSpec, NativeDevSettingsSpec, NativeDialogManagerAndroidSpec, NativeExceptionsManagerSpec, NativeFileReaderModuleSpec, NativeFrameRateLoggerSpec, NativeHeadlessJsTaskSupportSpec, NativeHeapCaptureSpec, NativeI18nManagerSpec, NativeImageEditorSpec, NativeImageLoaderAndroidSpec, NativeImageLoaderIOSSpec, NativeImageLoaderSpec, NativeImagePickerIOSSpec, NativeImageStoreSpec, NativeJSCSamplingProfilerSpec, NativeJSDevSupportSpec, NativeKeyboardObserverSpec, NativeLinkingSpec, NativeLogBoxSpec, NativeModalManagerSpec, NativeNetworkingAndroidSpec, NativeNetworkingIOSSpec, NativePermissionsAndroidSpec, NativePlatformConstantsAndroidSpec, NativePlatformConstantsIOSSpec, NativePushNotificationManagerIOSSpec, NativeRedBoxSpec, NativeSegmentFetcherSpec, NativeSettingsManagerSpec, NativeShareModuleSpec, NativeSoundManagerSpec, NativeSourceCodeSpec, NativeStatusBarManagerAndroidSpec, NativeStatusBarManagerIOSSpec, NativeStatusBarManagerSpec, NativeTimePickerAndroidSpec, NativeTimingSpec, NativeToastAndroidSpec, NativeTVNavigationEventEmitterSpec, NativeUIManagerSpec, NativeVibrationSpec, NativeWebSocketModuleSpec, NetworkingModule, SourceCodeModule, WebSocketModule

    public interface TurboModule
    All turbo modules should inherit from this interface

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void invalidate()
      When CatalystInstance is destroyed, this method will be called.

    • 方法详细资料

      • invalidate

        void invalidate()
        When CatalystInstance is destroyed, this method will be called. All implementing TurboModules can perform cleanup here.
